front.title: IEEE Guide for Microwave Communications System Development: Design, Procurement, Construction, Maintenance and Operation

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The needs and requirements specific to the design, procurement, construction, maintenance, and operation of a microwave system are addressed. Steps for a variety of applications have been included in this guide; however, users should select only those steps that apply to their particular system(s) and their procurement policies.
